name: 積體電路與靜電放電防護設計實務
description: Electrostatic discharge (ESD) is one of the most prevalent threats to the reliability of electronic components. Designing integrated circuits (ICs) with effective ESD protection circuits is a high priority in the semiconductor industry. This course provides an overview of IC and ESD protection design. Several case studies and practices are included in this course.
goals: 增進學生對積體電路與靜電放電防護設計的理解。
培養學生實作積體電路與靜電放電防護設計之能力。
使學生具備高階積體電路設計之能力，以符合IC設計公司之人力需求。
培養學生興趣，進一步奠定學生終身學習之基礎。
syllabus:
Week 1~2

Industrial Standards and Testing on IC Products

Week 3~5

Basic Protection Concept

Week 6~7

Input/Output ESD Protection

Week 8

Midterm Exam

Week 9~11

Process, Device, and Layout Issues

Week 12~13

Power-Rail ESD Protection

Week 14~15

Advanced ESD Protection

Week 16

Final Exam

\*第17~18週之課程時間為自主學習 (上機練習)  
\*教學進度與主題會依實際情況略作調整

**建議先修課程**  
電子學(一)、電子學(二)、積體電路可靠度

**課程簡介**  
Electrostatic discharge (ESD) is one of the most prevalent threats to the reliability of electronic components. Designing integrated circuits (ICs) with effective ESD protection circuits is a high priority in the semiconductor industry. This course provides an overview of IC and ESD protection design. Several case studies and practices are included in this course.

methodologies.note: 針對基本的積體電路與靜電放電防護設計進行講授。
課程中會提出一些思考問題，讓同學們互相討論並回答。
訓練學生思考與解決積體電路之靜定放電問題。
訓練學生實際設計積體電路與靜電放電防護電路之能力，提升學生實務技能。

grading.note: 課程內容相關實作之成果報告
